Package com.intellij.psi.impl.source

Class FileLocalResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.impl.source.FileLocalResolver

  • public class FileLocalResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Resolves unambiguous Java identifiers inside a file (if it can), using LighterAST. Can be used during indexing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getLightTree

        public LighterAST getLightTree()

      • resolveLocally

        public FileLocalResolver.LightResolveResult resolveLocally(LighterASTNode ref)
        Parameters:
        ref - reference node
        Returns:
        a resolve result corresponding to a local variable, parameter or field that the given reference resolves to.

      • getShortClassTypeName

        public java.lang.String getShortClassTypeName(LighterASTNode var)
        Determine the type name of the given variable. Can be used to later iterate over all classes with this name for lightweight checks before loading AST and fully resolving the type.
        Parameters:
        var - Variable node
        Returns:
        the short name of the class corresponding to the type of the variable, or null if the variable is not of class type or the type is generic

      • getShortClassTypeName

        public java.lang.String getShortClassTypeName(LighterASTNode var,
                                              int arrayDepth)
        Determine the type name of the given variable, unwrapping the expected array type. Can be used to later iterate over all classes with this name for lightweight checks before loading AST and fully resolving the type.
        Parameters:
        var - Variable node
        arrayDepth - Expected array depth
        Returns:
        the short name of the class corresponding to the type of the variable, or null if the variable is not of class type or the type is generic
